lines.text: I hate photographing people, people are the worst.
Someone said "If you stand in one spot long enough, the whole world will pass by." I don't know who said that, but he's an idiot.
You're a Catholic hospital. So you better not be bullshitting me!
It was an important lesson I learned; You maybe disappointed by a persons humanity but never by their greed.
Sometimes it seems like nothing ever works out. What's worse is sometimes things almost work out then fall apart. If this is the way life is how do people stand it?
